Label.text: Ok. We promise this is the last time we will need to ask you for enabling permissions.
The Accessibility permission allows us to sense which app you are using so we can give you an appropriate nudge if you asked for it.
1. Tap the button below to get to your Settings.
2. Once there, tap on 'HabitLab' to get to HabitLab's service page.
3. Tap on the toggle to switch it to the 'on' position!
4. If your Android version is less than 6.0, restart your phone.
